name: Max Knight
overview: Max Knight is a platform game where the eponymous knight has to rescue his brother who has been taken away by a dragon. The game is made up of 36 single screen levels in five worlds and the objective in each is to collect all keys and other items and head for the exit. At the same time there are numerous enemies, animals and evil creatures, that have to be avoided by jumping over them. Any contact with an enemy leads to one out of five lives being lost but it is possible to refill them by collecting hearts. On some levels there are levers that need to be pulled to progress.
